actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income the gain on certain sales of lands subject to ground leases.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any gain realized from the sale to the lessee, on or before December 31, 1995, of land subject to a ground lease and on which the only buildings are residential.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income the gain on certain sales of lands subject to ground leases.
